name: PORK FILLET PLATTER
description: Duchesse mashed potatoes, red wine sauce, béarnaise, and fried vegetables

name: RYDBERG BEEF
description: Diced beef fillet, potatoes, onions, served with Dijon mustard cream and raw egg yolk

name: SPICY CHEESEBURGER
description: 180-gram chuck steak burger with lettuce, tomato, pickled red onions, cheddar cheese with jalapeños, and barbecue sauce in brioche bread, served with fries and smoky ranch aioli

name: HALLOUMI BURGER
description: Lettuce, tomato, red onion, and guacamole in brioche bread, served with fries and aioli

name: FISH AND CHIPS
description: "Beer-battered" cod loin with dill aioli, pan-fried lemon, and fries

name: HOUSE SCHNITZEL
description: 200-gram well-pounded schnitzel "Borås largest" with lemon, capers, anchovies, herb butter, and red wine sauce, served with fried potatoes

name: CAESAR SALAD
description: Warm chicken, bacon, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing

name: SALMON SALAD WITH QUINOA
description: Grilled salmon with quinoa, cocktail tomatoes, mixed greens, carrot julienne, red onion with a vinaigrette

name: CREAMY CHICKEN PASTA
description: Sun-dried tomatoes, basil, vegetables, and Parmesan cheese

name: MUSSELS AL CAVA
description: Steamed mussels in a creamy cava sauce, topped with crème fraîche and jalapeños, served with fries and aioli

name: GRILLED BEEF TENDERLOIN
description: 200-gram beef tenderloin, red wine sauce, sautéed vegetables, served with potato gratin (available with fries and béarnaise sauce)
